mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_verifications (verification_id,user_email, verification_code, expiration_time, is_verified, created_at) VALUES (verification_id_seq.nextval,#{userEmail}, #{verificationCode}, #{expirationTime}, #{isVerified}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE email_verifications SET is_verified = 'Y' WHERE VERIFICATION_ID = #{verificationId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM email_verifications WHERE verification_code = #{verificationCode} and user_email = #{userEmail}
